sourceDesc.p: No source: created in electronic format.

encodingDesc.p: Encoding according to the CCH TEI Guidelines at http://abc.org

body.head: Publications
body.p: ncse published two articles over the course of the project. These are:

listBibl.bibl: Mussell, James and Suzanne Paylor, Editions and Archives: Textual Editing and the Nineteenth-Century Serials Edition (ncse), in Text Editing, Print and the Digital World, ed. by Marilyn Deegan and Kathryn Sutherland (Ashgate 2007).

Mussell, James and Suzanne Paylor,
Mapping the “Mighty Maze:” the Nineteenth-Century Serials Edition, 19: Interdisciplinary Studies in the Long Nineteenth Century, 1 (2005). To download this paper click here.

body.p: Project members also gave regular papers about the project at various conferences and symposia. Deatails of these and copies of the papers are available from the Conferences page.

The project also issued regular newsletters. These can be downloaded from the list below:
Issue 1: June 2005
Issue 2: December 2005
Issue 3: June 2006
Issue 4: December 2006
Issue 5: July 2007
